messages.message:
Good morning team,

Seems like I cant delete a validation rule because of foreign key constraints

```    "message": "Failed to delete validation rule: Error 1451 (23000): Cannot delete or update a parent row: a foreign key constraint fails (`ibdb`.`project_validation_udfs`, CONSTRAINT `project_validation_udfs_rule_id_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`rule_id`) REFERENCES `validation_rules` (`id`))" ```
Is this expected? If so I think we should provide some error message on the modal
hmm what env is this? I modified (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/73664) this constraint 2 weeks ago
My crafting sandbox, I just rebased against master though
Can you paste the cURL request here?

```curl 'https://https--sherifelmetwally-instabase.instabase.site.sandboxes.run/api/v2/aihub/build/projects/0198af49-b4d6-79e5-ad43-597109bfe268/validations?id=25' \

hmm did you restart core-platform-service after rebasing on master?

Actually I think the issue may be that you need to apply the changes I made to the DB here.

Can you run
```DB_PARAMS="--username=root --host=mysql --database=ibdb --port=3306" go run instabase/utils/db/tools/dbmigrate```
Relevant section (https://docs.google.com/document/d/1mM32cCbi4NFtphnlu1T8rtsc0lsfj3FZWfNrKmui34M/edit?tab=t.0#heading=h.uigwvfmjos5m)
Okay yeah that did the trick, thank you!
